name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in crafting high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and frameworks such as **Vue.js** and **Nuxt.js**. Demonstrated expertise in using **Vite** for optimized development workflows and implementing **Websockets** and **Fetch API** for real-time data handling.  
Skilled in leveraging **Git** for version control, and implementing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration. Strong understanding of **CI/CD** processes using **Gitlab CI** and **Github Actions**, along with a commitment to best practices in **Unit tests** and performance optimization through **PWA** and **Service workers**. Also experienced in applying solid **Design patterns** and working with **Microfrontends** for scalable solutions. A proven track record in developing AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:

• Implemented CI/CD pipelines leveraging **GitHub Actions** for automated testing and deployment, improving release times by **30%**.
• Collaborated on microfrontend architecture, employing design patterns to create modular applications that simplify maintenance and scalability.
• Created and managed unit tests with **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving a test coverage of over **85%** and ensuring code reliability and quality during integrations.
• Utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration of applications, facilitating smooth deployment processes and consistent environments across stages.
• Enhanced application performance through **Websockets** and **Fetch API** for real-time data updates, crucial for user engagement in dynamic applications.
• Conducted code reviews and implemented best practices in responsive design and PWA functionality, significantly improving site performance metrics by **25%**.
• Designed component libraries using **Vue.js** and **Nuxt.js** that align with branding and accessibility standards, resulting in a consistent look and feel across all products.
• Optimized build times with **Vite**, reducing initial load time by **40%** while ensuring high performance in production environments.
• Actively engaged with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide technical guidance, leading to the successful launch of **5** major features in the last fiscal year.

Utilized **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript** to architect and develop robust user-facing applications, achieving a **50%** reduction in load time across platforms.

Utilized **Websockets** for real-time data updates in the UI, improving the responsiveness of applications during peak usage periods.

Enhanced user interactions through **PWA** features and service workers, resulting in an application experience akin to native apps on mobile platforms.

Designed and optimized frontend architectures using **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Vue.js** (3) to create responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs, enhancing mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
Utilized **Vue.js** with **Nuxt.js** to develop high-performance single-page applications (SPAs), achieving a **30%** improvement in load times across various devices.
Implemented Progressive Web Applications (PWAs) with **service workers** and caching strategies, increasing engagement and reducing server load by **25%** through efficient resource management.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** to facilitate dynamic updates for shopping carts and order tracking, enhancing user interactivity and experience.

Developed unit tests to ensure code reliability and project maintainability, achieving **95%** code coverage across critical application components.
Explored microfrontend architectures to enhance code modularity and team scalability, allowing for incrementally upgradable components without affecting the overall application performance.
Administered role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 standards to safeguard sensitive user data and maintain compliance with GDPR throughout the frontend application.
Engaged in design patterns and best practices for scalable web development, delivering maintainable and efficient code structures adaptable to future project requirements.
